message.body: Im thinking of renting out the childrens discovery museum overnight for ilianas birthday. A night at the museum party. It's $300 but thats how much monkey joes is too for only 2 hours. This is 14 hours. You think it would be cool?
Yes! They usually do a planetarium show or something. Warning, when I worked at the museum, a lot if kids got scared and had to be picked up. Haha
But they were usually a little younger than Iliana
It sounds like a lot of fun. Its a small museum. They will only have 1 staff member on and all activities are up to me. But sounds fun
